TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ITextControl

summary.span: 定义控件实现以获取或设置其文本内容的接口。

span.span: Defines the interface a control implements to get or set its text content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口定义控件实现以便获取的属性或其文本内容的设置。The interface defines the property a control implements to allow the getting or setting of its text content. 可以以编程方式或通过用户输入设置属性。The property can be set programmatically or through user input. > [!CAUTION] > 实现此接口的控件可以用于显示用户输入。A control implementing this interface can be used to display user input. 显示用户输入前, 必须输入检查恶意客户端的脚本，如可执行的脚本或 SQL 语句。Before displaying user input, the input must be checked for malicious client script, such as executable script or SQL statements. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现的自定义控件接口。The following code example shows a custom control that implements the interface. 默认值分配给属性如果`null`传递给属性。A default value is assigned to the property if `null` is passed to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/CS/CustomTextControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/VB/CustomTextControl.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ Text { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.Text : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置控件的文本内容。

span.span: Gets or sets the text content of a control.
The text content of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以以编程方式或通过用户输入设置属性。The property can be set programmatically or through user input. > [!CAUTION] > 实现此接口的控件可以用于显示用户输入。A control implementing this interface can be used to display user input. 显示用户输入前, 必须输入检查恶意客户端的脚本，如可执行的脚本或 SQL 语句。Before displaying user input, the input must be checked for malicious client script, such as executable script or SQL statements. ASP.NET 提供的一输入的请求验证功能块脚本和 HTML 在用户输入。ASP.NET provides an input request validation feature to block script and HTML in user input. 验证服务器控件还提供用于评估用户输入。Validation server controls are also provided to assess user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[验证服务器控件语法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133)。For more information, see [Validation Server Control Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/96d2c59e-693c-4079-9b53-b3ff0d9e9133). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示实现的自定义控件接口。The following code example shows a custom control that implements the interface. 默认值分配给属性如果`null`传递给属性。A default value is assigned to the property if `null` is passed to the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/CS/CustomTextControl.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.ITextControl#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.ITextControl/VB/CustomTextControl.vb#1)]
